title: Pentesting
description: Hands-on labs to learn offensive hacking and vulnerability exploitation. Practice real-world attack techniques in controlled environments.

title: Security Analyst
description: Learn SOC operations, incident response, and monitoring tools. Build skills in threat detection and security operations center workflows.

title: Network Security
description: Master firewalls, IDS/IPS, and secure network design. Understand network protocols and implement robust security architectures.

title: Forensics
description: Investigate breaches, analyze logs, and recover digital evidence. Learn to trace attacks and preserve evidence for legal proceedings.
